title: Re: Favorite metal album
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Rorie how can you place two Pantera (!) albums in this poll and one from Winger a band where I've never heard of.[hr][/quote]

to explain a bit more about winger, winger started in 1988 after alice cooper bass player kip winger left his band to start his own together the band wrote 3 records winger 1988 in the heart of the young 1990 & pull 1993 afterwards kip winger left to pursue a solo carrer, you can find more by doing a search in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page]wikipedia[/url]Rorie

title: Re: Favorite metal album
content:
